_meta.description: Master configuration for the autonomous aging research pipeline.

geo.note: GEO dataset discovery. Disabled by default.

epigenetic.label: Epigenetic / Information Aging
epigenetic.pubmed_query: ("Aging"[MeSH] OR "biological aging"[tiab] OR "epigenetic aging"[tiab]) AND ("DNA Methylation"[MeSH] OR "Epigenomics"[MeSH] OR "Histones"[MeSH] OR "epigenetic clock"[tiab] OR "GrimAge"[tiab] OR "DunedinPACE"[tiab] OR "Horvath clock"[tiab] OR "methylation drift"[tiab] OR "chromatin remodeling"[tiab] OR "transcriptomic noise"[tiab] OR "histone modification"[tiab]) AND ("biomarker"[tiab] OR "intervention"[tiab] OR "treatment"[tiab] OR "reprogramming"[tiab] OR "HDAC"[tiab] OR "alpha-ketoglutarate"[tiab] OR "clinical trial"[pt] OR "cohort"[tiab] OR "longitudinal"[tiab])

senescence.label: Cellular Senescence / Inflammaging
senescence.pubmed_query: ("Cellular Senescence"[MeSH] OR "cellular senescence"[tiab] OR "inflammaging"[tiab] OR "inflamm-aging"[tiab] OR "immunosenescence"[tiab]) AND ("SASP"[tiab] OR "senescence-associated secretory"[tiab] OR "senolytic"[tiab] OR "senomorphic"[tiab] OR "p16"[tiab] OR "CDKN2A"[tiab] OR "SA-beta-gal"[tiab] OR "dasatinib"[tiab] OR "quercetin"[tiab] OR "fisetin"[tiab] OR "navitoclax"[tiab] OR "ABT-263"[tiab] OR "Interleukin-6"[MeSH] OR "Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha"[MeSH] OR "senescent cells"[tiab] OR "senostatic"[tiab]) AND ("Aging"[MeSH] OR "aging"[tiab] OR "aged"[tiab] OR "age-related"[tiab] OR "lifespan"[tiab] OR "healthspan"[tiab] OR "longevity"[tiab])

mitochondrial.label: Mitochondrial Dysfunction
mitochondrial.pubmed_query: ("Mitochondria"[MeSH] OR "mitochondrial dysfunction"[tiab] OR "Mitophagy"[MeSH] OR "mitophagy"[tiab]) AND ("Aging"[MeSH] OR "aging"[tiab] OR "age-related"[tiab] OR "aged"[tiab]) AND ("NAD"[tiab] OR "NAD+"[tiab] OR "NMN"[tiab] OR "nicotinamide mononucleotide"[tiab] OR "nicotinamide riboside"[tiab] OR "urolithin"[tiab] OR "electron transport"[tiab] OR "oxidative phosphorylation"[tiab] OR "mtDNA"[tiab] OR "mitochondrial DNA"[tiab] OR "Complex I"[tiab] OR "reactive oxygen species"[tiab] OR "MitoQ"[tiab] OR "elamipretide"[tiab] OR "biomarker"[tiab] OR "intervention"[tiab])

nutrient_sensing.label: Nutrient Sensing / Proteostasis
nutrient_sensing.pubmed_query: ("TOR Serine-Threonine Kinases"[MeSH] OR "mTOR"[tiab] OR "AMP-Activated Protein Kinases"[MeSH] OR "AMPK"[tiab] OR "Autophagy"[MeSH] OR "autophagy"[tiab] OR "proteostasis"[tiab] OR "protein homeostasis"[tiab] OR "Insulin-Like Growth Factor I"[MeSH] OR "insulin-IGF"[tiab]) AND ("Aging"[MeSH] OR "aging"[tiab] OR "lifespan"[tiab] OR "longevity"[tiab] OR "healthspan"[tiab] OR "age-related"[tiab]) AND ("rapamycin"[tiab] OR "rapalog"[tiab] OR "everolimus"[tiab] OR "metformin"[tiab] OR "spermidine"[tiab] OR "caloric restriction"[tiab] OR "calorie restriction"[tiab] OR "dietary restriction"[tiab] OR "fasting"[tiab] OR "protein aggregation"[tiab] OR "unfolded protein response"[tiab] OR "proteasome"[tiab] OR "intervention"[tiab] OR "clinical trial"[pt])

stem_cell_ecm.label: Stem Cell Exhaustion / ECM Remodeling
stem_cell_ecm.pubmed_query: ("Stem Cells"[MeSH] OR "stem cell"[tiab] OR "progenitor cell"[tiab] OR "Extracellular Matrix"[MeSH] OR "extracellular matrix"[tiab] OR "Fibrosis"[MeSH] OR "tissue stiffness"[tiab] OR "regenerative capacity"[tiab]) AND ("Aging"[MeSH] OR "aging"[tiab] OR "age-related"[tiab] OR "aged"[tiab]) AND ("stem cell exhaustion"[tiab] OR "niche"[tiab] OR "Klotho"[tiab] OR "GDF11"[tiab] OR "parabiosis"[tiab] OR "plasma exchange"[tiab] OR "plasma dilution"[tiab] OR "pirfenidone"[tiab] OR "collagen crosslink"[tiab] OR "MMP"[tiab] OR "TIMP"[tiab] OR "telomere"[tiab] OR "telomerase"[tiab] OR "regeneration"[tiab] OR "intervention"[tiab])

comparative.label: Comparative Longevity Biology
comparative.pubmed_query: ("Longevity"[MeSH] OR "longevity"[tiab] OR "lifespan"[tiab] OR "long-lived"[tiab] OR "negligible senescence"[tiab]) AND ("species"[tiab] OR "comparative"[tiab] OR "evolutionary"[tiab] OR "Heterocephalus"[tiab] OR "naked mole rat"[tiab] OR "bowhead whale"[tiab] OR "Balaena"[tiab] OR "Greenland shark"[tiab] OR "Myotis"[tiab] OR "bat"[tiab] OR "tortoise"[tiab] OR "rockfish"[tiab] OR "Sebastes"[tiab] OR "cancer resistance"[tiab] OR "cross-species"[tiab] OR "ortholog"[tiab] OR "maximum lifespan"[tiab])
